title: CyclingTips Podcast: The Vuelta a España is off to a promising start
content:
CyclingTips Podcast: The Vuelta a España is off to a promising start

This week on the CyclingTips podcast…

We break down the first three stages of the Vuelta a España, and speculate what the next 18 stages could bring. Abby gives a brief rundown of the Ladies Tour of Norway. A deeper dive can be found on the Freewheeling Podcast.

Ronan catches up with the new women’s Everesting world record holder Illi Gardner.

And Silca released a pair of socks that claim to save eight watts! That is not an insignificant amount of watts.
